polymorph.UI.fieldinterface module¶

class polymorph.UI.fieldinterface.FieldInterface(field, index, layername, poisoner=None)[source]¶

Bases: polymorph.UI.interface.Interface

This class is responsible for parsing and respond to user commands in the field interface, when the user already has a packet capture.

run()[source]¶

Runs the interface and waits for user input commands.

polymorph.UI.maininterface module¶

class polymorph.UI.maininterface.MainInterface[source]¶

Bases: polymorph.UI.interface.Interface

This class is responsible for parsing and respond to user commands in the starting interface, when no action has been carried out.

static capture_help()[source]¶

Builds the help for the capture command.

polymorph.UI.templateinterface module¶

class polymorph.UI.templateinterface.TemplateInterface(template, index, poisoner=None)[source]¶

Bases: polymorph.UI.interface.Interface

This class is responsible for parsing and respond to user commands in the Template interface, when the user already select a particular Template.

run()[source]¶

Runs the interface and waits for user input commands.
